title: (x) Enter Le Tigre - Futura Black {Norbert}
content:
I am having a brain fart and cannot place this font.

[http://www.letigreworld.com/sweepstakes/enter.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128104127/http:/www.letigreworld.com/sweepstakes/enter.gif)

I know this one was just answered a couple days ago, but couldn’t find it.

It doesn’t have to be this exact font, I just need fonts in this style.

Thank you.
author: Guerella

comments.content:
[Futura Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128104127/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.8265.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=60&sampleText=enter+TIGRE&sampleSize=48), messed around with.

Yes, I’m old, but I’m back in style!

Thank you. I knew it was Futura, but I couldn’t find it in my set.  
The only weight I don’t own!
